description:
top image: right profile; nose with large bump at top; turban-like hat with large knot and long ends

lower image;  right profile of young man; flat hat with tail at back
dimension:
4 1/4 x 3 1/8 in. (10.8 x 7.94 cm) (image, sheet, top image)
4 1/4 x 3 3/16 in. (10.8 x 8.1 cm) (image, sheet, lower image)
11 7/8 x 9 1/4 in. (30.16 x 23.5 cm) (mount)
18 x 4 1/16 in. (45.72 x 10.32 cm) (mat)
marks:
Signature, and Inscription

upper image: in plat See Inscription
title: Old Man Wearing Turban Ornamented with Fur(upper); Young Man with Eyes Lowered Wearing a Cap Ornamented with Plumes(lower)
